item.description: ã€Today we released PIX version 2503.24, which can be downloadedÂ here. This release includes everything in the previous 2501.30 release, plus the following bug fixes: Fix capture-time crash introduced in 2501.30 in CPU write tracking code Fix capture-time issue with reserved resources, that could cause replay-time corruption for some UE5 captures Fix PIXBeginCapture() deadlocking for Timing […]ã€‘ä»Šå¤©ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å‘å¸ƒäº†PIXç‰ˆæœ¬2503.24ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„ä¸‹è½½ã€‚æ­¤ç‰ˆæœ¬åŒ…æ‹¬ä¸Šä¸€ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰å†…å®¹ï¼Œä»¥åŠä»¥ä¸‹é”™è¯¯ä¿®å¤ï¼šä¿®å¤æ•è·æ—¶é—´å´©æºƒåœ¨2501.30ä¸­å¼•å…¥çš„CPUå†™å…¥è·Ÿè¸ªä»£ç ä¿®å¤äº†ä½¿ç”¨ä¿ç•™èµ„æºçš„æ•è·æ—¶é—´é—®é¢˜ï¼Œè¿™å¯èƒ½ä¼šå¯¼è‡´æŸäº›UE5æ•è·çš„é‡æ’­æ—¶é—´æŸåfix fix fix pixbegincaptureï¼ˆpixbebegincaptureï¼ˆ

item.description: ã€Introduction Creating a new CMake project that uses unfamiliar libraries can be daunting and time-consuming.
